snippet: The animals are the most likely intermediary in the transmission from bats to humans of the virus that causes Middle East Respiratory Syndrome.
abstract: Evidence is mounting that camels are the most likely intermediary in the transmission from bats to humans of virus that causes Middle East Respiratory Syndrome.
lead_paragraph: The animals are the most likely intermediary in the transmission from bats to humans of the virus that causes Middle East Respiratory Syndrome.

headline.main: Camels Linked to Spread of Fatal Virus
headline.print_headline: Camels Linked To Spread Of Fatal Virus
